short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Application performance monitoring, part of Aternity Agent

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension cannot be used as a standalone installation. 
It is deployed as part of the Aternity Agent client.
The extension monitors and reports navigation and in-app operation times to the Aternity Agent, a part of the Aternity Digital Experience Management solution.
Aternity facilitates managing the enterprises digital experience, providing visibility on events such as application launch time and responsiveness, as well as system load, crashes and much more.
For more details on Aternity, please see https://help.aternity.com 

Notes:
For more details on the Chrome extension, please refer to https://help.aternity.com/bundle/console_install_guide_x_console_saas/page/console/topics/console_install_chrome_ext.html
The Aternity product in its entirety and the Chrome extension in particular adhere to strict security and privacy standards - including GDPR and HIPAA.
For full details refer to our privacy page: https://help.aternity.com/privacy
